summary: Confidential counseling services for enrolled students. Replace with your actual campus info.

summary: 24/7 free and confidential emotional support in the US.

summary: Find nearby mental health and substance use treatment services in the US.

summary: Information, resource referrals, and support for people and families.

summary: 24/7 confidential crisis support for service members and veterans.

summary: 24/7 crisis intervention and suicide prevention for LGBTQ+ young people.

title: Trans Lifeline
summary: Peer support hotline run by and for trans people.

title: Samaritans (UK & Ireland)
summary: 24/7 confidential emotional support via phone, email, or chat.

title: Talk Suicide Canada
summary: 24/7 bilingual crisis support across Canada; text and phone options.

title: Lifeline (Australia)
summary: 24/7 crisis support and suicide prevention services in Australia.

title: Mind (UK)
summary: Trusted information on mental health problems, services, and support.

summary: Evidence-based tips, self-help tools, and therapist directory.

summary: Research-backed articles and tips to improve sleep and mood.

summary: Search for licensed therapists by location, specialty, and insurance.
